SPIDER.name: Massive Spider
SPIDER.look: A massive spider. Like, really big. You've never seen one this big before.

web.desc: The spider shoots a web at you.
web.desc-hit: The spider's web tangles around you.

GOBLIN.name: Goblin
GOBLIN.look: A goblin. These ex-humans have been corrupted by the necromancer's influence over the area.

spear.desc: The Goblin attempts to attack you with their spear.
spear.desc-hit: The Goblin impales your chest with their spear.
spear.desc-miss: The Goblin's spear misses its mark.

spear2.desc: The Goblin attempts to attack you with their spear.
spear2.desc-hit: The Goblin slices your leg with their spear.
spear2.desc-miss: The Goblin's spear misses its mark.

WRAITH.name: Wraith
WRAITH.look: The wraith's black cloak obscures its face, assuming it even has one. It carries a scythe.

slice.desc: The wraith lifts is scythe above its shoulders.
slice.desc-hit: The wraith swings its scythe and strikes your abdomen.
slice.desc-miss: The wraith swings its scythe, but misses.

howl.desc: The wraith unleashes an unearthly howl.
howl.desc-hit: You are absolutely shook by the wraith's howl.

soul.desc: The wraith points its bony finger at you.
soul.desc-hit: You feel your soul being pulled away
soul.desc-miss: Your soul remains firmly seated within you.

ORC.name: Orc
ORC.look: This big, bulky creature carries a large club.

prepare.desc: The Orc lifts their club with both hands and prepares a powerful attack.

next-action.desc: The Orc swings their massive club towards you.
next-action.desc-hit: The club slams into your side, knocking the wind out of you.
next-action.desc-miss: The Orc narrowly misses crushing you with their club.

smash.desc: The Orc swings at you with their club.
smash.desc-hit: The Orc hits you in the arm with their club.
